data.title: TIME Reveals the 2023 Person, Athlete and CEO of the Year
data.meta_description: TIME has chosen Taylor Swift, Lionel Messi and Sam Altman as Person, Athlete and CEO of the year, respectively.
data.text:
Presented By

Entertainment

Person of the Year 2023

WATCH: TIME Reveals the 2023 Person of the Year, CEO of the Year and Athlete of the Year

WATCH: TIME Reveals the 2023 Person of the Year, CEO of the Year and Athlete of the Year

1 minute read

TIME Video

December 6, 2023 2:56 PM EST

TIME has chosen Taylor Swift as Person of the Year, Lionel Messi as Athlete of the Year, and Sam Altman as CEO of the Year. This reflects the editors’ assessment of the individuals who most shaped the headlines over the previous 12 months, for better or for worse.
